name: Log4net-mongo
body:
### Mongo Appender for Log4Net

This project provides a Mongo based buffering appender for Log4net. 
The core code uses Nuget and will also be available as a NuGet package. To build the bleeding edge code:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout develop
```

For use with Sitecore, assembly binding instructions will be provided.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
